sentences.sContent: Diphtheria antitoxin is a foreign protein .
sentences.sCn: 白喉抗毒素是异性蛋白。

sentences.sContent: We need an antitoxin to counteract the bite of the tarantula.
sentences.sContent_eng: We need an antitoxin to counteract the bite of the tarantula.
sentences.sCn: 我们需要抗毒素来解被狼蛛咬后产生的毒。

trans.tranOther: a medicine or substance produced by your body which stops the effects of a poison
